message:
What about Egyptian-Geeks-Weekly :-D ?! 
A website that spreads the knowledge and experience of this group's experts in their fields. I know that members will have limited time to write posts for this project, but it would be easy if we had more experts to contribute.
What about having departments for technologies; languages, front-end, back-end, big data, machine learning, Software design, security, best practices, etc. 
I think it will make a difference and improve developers' quality. 
Does this idea worth consideration or "kollo fel keltsh" :-D ??

data.message:
I like the idea. Even if it's too hard to have it as a "weekly" we can make it Bi-weekly.
Also, as a motivation for the writers, they can write the posts in their blogs and the weekly then becomes a list of links from different blogs. It's then a win win, for the writers and readers.

How will you generate money? answering this question is a validation for the idea, otherwise, it will die, I like Eslam's idea about using existing websites or blogs, this can be a start to validate people's interest in such thing as you don't need only writers.

good idea ! i have only one suggestion main language must be arabic , in this way we can help young people and new developers 
and any one attend to know !
